.. mydisease.info documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Mon Apr  6 20:46:36 2015.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

MyDisease.info documentation
****************************

Introduction
------------
.. image:: _static/mydisease.png
    :align: left
    :height: 95pt
    :width: 123pt
    :alt: mydisease.info

.. cssclass:: head-paragraph

  `MyDisease.info <http://mydisease.info>`_ provides simple-to-use REST web services to query/retrieve all disease annotation data. It's designed with an emphasis on **simplicity** and **performance**.

.. include:: doc/quick_start.rst


Documentation
---------------------

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 3

    Try it live on interactive API page <http://mydisease.info/>
    doc/data
    doc/release_changes
    doc/disease_query_service
    doc/disease_annotation_service
    doc/response_status_codes
    doc/packages

-------------
